title: Custom announcer pack problem
body:
I everyone,

Like ten minutes ago, i tried to get the Imaqtpie pack for my announcer, but it wasn,t working, and even if i deleted the original file (basic announcer) and replaced it with the new one, it was still the old classic female voice.

Anyone know what to do?

replies.body: We don't support third party modifications, and doing it is at your own risk.  We can't support any issues or file corruption that occurs as a result.  Your best bet would be to restore your game files to prevent issues like this.  You're welcome to use the  [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to help with a fresh reinstall.  Hope that helps!
Is changing the announcer pack a bannable offense?
